Player History
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/2/1969 to a 2-year deal worth $3,250,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/1/1971 to a 1-year deal worth $7,180,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/10/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/1/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 86th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1975...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 2/10/1975 (Going to NYM: RF G. Kubski. Going to LA: P R. Scurry)...
Had first career hit on 5/3/1980, off John Lamb (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/2/1980, off Mike Norris (ATL)...
Injured on 5/14/1982 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/21/1985 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to St. Louis on 3/2/1987 (Going to STL: SS G. Kubski. Going to NYM: RF D. James)...
